channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi Energy -- MicroSCADA Pro SYS600
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi Energy -- MicroSCADA Pro SYS600

item.title: CVE-2022-3388|2024-08-03T01:07:06.515Z -- hitachi%20energy -- microscada%20pro%20sys600
item.description: An input validation vulnerability exists in the Monitor Pro interface of MicroSCADA Pro and MicroSCADA X SYS600. An authenticated user can launch an administrator level remote code execution irrespective of the authenticated user's role.
